languages.text: "Каждый арбитр сейчас занят удаленным контролем транспортационного протокола. Поодиночке никто не покидает аванпост, значит понадобится формировать отряд, и процесс погрузки остановится. Поверьте, я бы не просила о подобном Вольного Торговца, но я исхожу из оптимальной организации процесса".

traits.locale_text: "Каждый арбитр сейчас занят удаленным контролем транспортационного протокола. Поодиночке никто не покидает аванпост, значит понадобится формировать отряд, и процесс погрузки остановится. Поверьте, я бы не просила о подобном Вольного Торговца, но я исхожу из оптимальной организации процесса".

languages.text: "All Arbitrators are busy remotely monitoring the transport protocol. No one leaves the outpost alone, which means we would have to form a unit, and that, in turn, means the loading process would stop. Believe me: I would never have asked a Rogue Trader to run an errand for me, but I am doing my best to streamline the process."
languages.original_text: "Каждый арбитр сейчас занят удаленным контролем транспортационного протокола. Поодиночке никто не покидает аванпост, значит понадобится формировать отряд, и процесс погрузки остановится. Поверьте, я бы не просила о подобном Вольного Торговца, но я исхожу из оптимальной организации процесса".

traits.locale_text: "All arbitrators are busy remotely monitoring the transport protocol. No one leaves the outpost alone, which means we will have to form a unit and so the loading process will stop. Trust me, I would never ask a Rogue Trader to run an errand for me, but I am doing my best to streamline the process."

Trust me, I would never ask a Rogue Trader to run an errand for me, but I am doing my best to streamline the process."

languages.text: «Todos los Arbitrator están ocupados monitorizando a distancia el protocolo de transporte. Nadie abandona el puesto en solitario, lo que significa que debemos formar una unidad y eso, a su vez, detendría el proceso de carga. Créame: nunca le he pedido a un Comerciante Independiente que me haga un recado, pero hago todo lo que puedo por agilizar este proceso».
languages.original_text: "All Arbitrators are busy remotely monitoring the transport protocol. No one leaves the outpost alone, which means we would have to form a unit, and that, in turn, means the loading process would stop. Believe me: I would never have asked a Rogue Trader to run an errand for me, but I am doing my best to streamline the process."

traits.locale_text: «Todos los Arbitrator están ocupados monitorizando a distancia el protocolo de transporte. Nadie abandona el puesto en solitario, lo que significa que debemos formar una unidad y eso, a su vez, detendría el proceso de carga. Créame: nunca le he pedido a un Comerciante Independiente que me haga un recado, pero hago todo lo que puedo por agilizar este proceso».

languages.text: “所有法务官都在忙着远程监视传输协议，无人有权单独离开哨站。也就是说，法务官必须组成队伍才能离开，而这也就意味着装载工作将被迫中止。相信我，让行商浪人做跑腿的工作绝非我的本意。我已经尽了我最大的努力，让一切顺利运行。”
languages.original_text: "All Arbitrators are busy remotely monitoring the transport protocol. No one leaves the outpost alone, which means we would have to form a unit, and that, in turn, means the loading process would stop. Believe me: I would never have asked a Rogue Trader to run an errand for me, but I am doing my best to streamline the process."

traits.locale_text: “所有法务官都在忙着远程监视传输协议，无人有权单独离开哨站。也就是说，法务官必须组成队伍才能离开，而这也就意味着装载工作将被迫中止。相信我，让行商浪人做跑腿的工作绝非我的本意。我已经尽了我最大的努力，让一切顺利运行。”

languages.text: 「アービトレイターは皆、輸送プロトコルを遠隔で監視することに忙しいのです。誰も前哨基地を離れることはできません。それは、我々が部隊を編成しなければならないということであり、つまり積み込み作業が停止するということを意味します。本当です。私はローグトレーダーに使い走りを頼むようなことはありません。私は作業を円滑に進めるために最善を尽くしているのです」
languages.original_text: "All Arbitrators are busy remotely monitoring the transport protocol. No one leaves the outpost alone, which means we would have to form a unit, and that, in turn, means the loading process would stop. Believe me: I would never have asked a Rogue Trader to run an errand for me, but I am doing my best to streamline the process."

traits.locale_text: 「アービトレイターは皆、輸送プロトコルを遠隔で監視することに忙しいのです。誰も前哨基地を離れることはできません。それは、我々が部隊を編成しなければならないということであり、つまり積み込み作業が停止するということを意味します。本当です。私はローグトレーダーに使い走りを頼むようなことはありません。私は作業を円滑に進めるために最善を尽くしているのです」

languages.text: « Tous les arbitrators sont actuellement occupés à superviser à distance le transfert de la cargaison. Or, personne ici ne s'aventure seul en dehors de l'avant-poste, ce qui signifie que nous devrions former une unité et interrompre ce faisant le processus de chargement. Croyez-moi, en temps normal, je n'aurais jamais demandé à {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} de faire mon travail à ma place, mais en l'occurrence, je fais de mon mieux pour rationaliser les opérations. »
languages.original_text: "All Arbitrators are busy remotely monitoring the transport protocol. No one leaves the outpost alone, which means we would have to form a unit, and that, in turn, means the loading process would stop. Believe me: I would never have asked a Rogue Trader to run an errand for me, but I am doing my best to streamline the process."

traits.locale_text: « Tous les arbitrators sont actuellement occupés à superviser à distance le transfert de la cargaison. Or, personne ici ne s'aventure seul en dehors de l'avant-poste, ce qui signifie que nous devrions former une unité et interrompre ce faisant le processus de chargement. Croyez-moi, en temps normal, je n'aurais jamais demandé à {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} de faire mon travail à ma place, mais en l'occurrence, je fais de mon mieux pour rationaliser les opérations. »

languages.text: "Tüm Yargıcılar, nakliye protokolünü uzaktan gözetlemekle meşgul. Karakoldan kimse tek başına ayrılmaz. Bu durumda bir birim kurmamız gerekir ki bu da yükleme sürecinin durması anlamına gelir. Normalde bir Hür Tacir'den getir götür işi yapmasını asla istemezdim ama süreci kolaylaştırmak için elimden geleni yapmakla mükellefim."
languages.original_text: "All Arbitrators are busy remotely monitoring the transport protocol. No one leaves the outpost alone, which means we would have to form a unit, and that, in turn, means the loading process would stop. Believe me: I would never have asked a Rogue Trader to run an errand for me, but I am doing my best to streamline the process."

traits.locale_text: "Tüm Yargıcılar, nakliye protokolünü uzaktan gözetlemekle meşgul. Karakoldan kimse tek başına ayrılmaz. Bu durumda bir birim kurmamız gerekir ki bu da yükleme sürecinin durması anlamına gelir. Normalde bir Hür Tacir'den getir götür işi yapmasını asla istemezdim ama süreci kolaylaştırmak için elimden geleni yapmakla mükellefim."

languages.text: "Alle Arbitratoren sind mit der Fernüberwachung des Transportprotokolls beschäftigt. Niemand verlässt allein den Außenposten. Wir müssen also eine Einheit bilden, und das würde wiederum eine Unterbrechung des Ladeprozesses bedeuten. Glaubt mir: Ich hätte {mf|einen Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin} niemals gebeten, einen Botengang für mich zu erledigen, aber ich tue, was ich kann, um den Prozess zu straffen."
languages.original_text: "All Arbitrators are busy remotely monitoring the transport protocol. No one leaves the outpost alone, which means we would have to form a unit, and that, in turn, means the loading process would stop. Believe me: I would never have asked a Rogue Trader to run an errand for me, but I am doing my best to streamline the process."

traits.locale_text: "Alle Arbitratoren sind mit der Fernüberwachung des Transportprotokolls beschäftigt. Niemand verlässt allein den Außenposten. Wir müssen also eine Einheit bilden, und das würde wiederum eine Unterbrechung des Ladeprozesses bedeuten. Glaubt mir: Ich hätte {mf|einen Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin} niemals gebeten, einen Botengang für mich zu erledigen, aber ich tue, was ich kann, um den Prozess zu straffen."
